name: Daigasso! Band Brothers: Request Selection
description:
This is an expansion cartridge for Daigasso! Band Brothers for the Nintendo DS. It contains a selection of songs that fans of the game were able to request on Nintendo's Japanese website (hence the name of the cartridge). It contains a variety of J-Pop songs, Anime themes, and songs from Nintendo games. The cartridge will not work in a Game Boy Advance - it requires a Nintendo DS and a copy of Daigasso! Band Brothers to work. The songs on the cartridge are as follows:

ORANGE RANGE - Onegai! Senorita
Sukima Switch - Zenryoku Shounen
Ai Ootsuka - SMILY
Porno Graffitti - Neo Melodramatic
ORANGE RANGE - Hana
Kobukuro - Koko ni Shika Sakanai Hana
FLOW - DAYS
Ketsumeishi - Sakura
Yuzu - Eikou no Kakehashi
Mahora Gakuen Chuutoubu 2-A - Happy Material
SMAP - Sekai ni Hitotsu Dake no Hana
ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION - Rewrite
day after tomorrow - Starry Heavens
Karyuudo - Azusa Ni-Gou
BUMP OF CHICKEN - Tentai Kansoku
Sasuke - Aoi Bench
Man Z - Nihon Break Kougyou Shaka
Undergraph - Tsubasa
Janne Da Arc - Gekkou Ka
O-Zone - Dragostea din Tei
ORANGE RANGE - Love Parade
Ken Matsudaira - Matsuken Samba Part 2
Star Fox 64 - Star Wolf Theme
Shin Onigashima - Yama e no Michi
Catch! Touch! Yoshi! - Tokotoko Yoshi
Sawaru Made in Wario - Ashley's Theme
Animal Crossing + - Title Theme
Donkey Kong Jungle Beat - Theme
Super Mario 64 DS - Slider
Famicom Tantei Club - Ayumi's Theme
Yoshi's Island - Athletic
